name.ja: <ruby>ＲＲ<rt>レイド・ラプターズ</rt></ruby>－ライジング・リベリオン・ファルコン

text.en:
5 Level 13 Winged Beast monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can destroy as many cards your opponent controls as possible, then, if this card has 3 or more "Raidraptor" Xyz Monsters with different names as material, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monsters' total original ATK. Unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per turn: You can detach 3 materials from this card, then target 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster in your GY; replace this effect with that monster's original effects until the End Phase.
